mapper.select: SELECT USERCODE, USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, GRADE, ADDR, EMAIL, TO_CHAR( JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) AS JOINDATE, POINT, DELMEM, NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE DELMEM <= 0 ORDER BY USERCODE DESC

SELECT USERCODE, USERID, PASSWD, USERNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, GRADE, ADDR, EMAIL, TO_CHAR( JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) AS JOINDATE, POINT, DELMEM, NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USERCODE = #{ usercode }
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWD = #{ passwd }, USERNAME = #{ username }, BIRTHDAY = #{ birthday }, GENDER = #{ gender }, GRADE = #{ grade }, ADDR = #{ addr }, EMAIL = #{ email }, POINT = #{ point } WHERE USERCODE = #{ usercode }
mapper.delete: UPDATE MEMBER SET DELMEM = 1 WHERE USERCODE = #{ usercode }

SELECT submenu_id,submenu_seq FROM ( SELECT 'SUBMENU' || TRIM( TO_CHAR( SUBSTR( NVL( MAX(SUBMENU_ID), 'SUBMENU00'), 8, 2 ) +1, '00') ) AS SUBMENU_ID FROM SUBMENUS) submenu_id, (SELECT NVL( MAX(SUBMENU_SEQ), 0 ) + 1 as submenu_seq FROM SUBMENUS) submenu_seq

mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NREF DESC, STEP ASC) RNUM, B.BOARD_IDX, B.SUBMENU_ID, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONT, B.MARKET_VALUE, M.USERCODE, MA.MANAGERCODE, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BOARD_REGDATE, B.READCOUNT, B.BNUM, B.LVL, B.STEP, B.NREF, B.DELBOARD, B.PARENT, M.NICKNAME FROM BOARD B FULL OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON B.USERCODE = M.USERCODE FULL OUTER JOIN MANAGER MA ON B.MANAGERCODE = MA.MANAGERCODE WHERE SUBMENU_ID = 'SUBMENU17'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_IDX, SUBMENU_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONT, MARKET_VALUE, BNUM, NREF ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL( MAX(BOARD_IDX), 0 ) + 1 FROM BOARD), 'SUBMENU17', #{ board_title }, #{ board_cont }, #{ market_value }, (SELECT NVL( MAX(BOARD_IDX), 0 ) + 1 FROM BOARD), (SELECT NVL( MAX(BOARD_IDX), 0 ) + 1 FROM BOARD) )
